long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MTM is a tab manager for side panel, It offers following functionality

1. multiple windows and multiple groups
2. move tab from window/group to another window/group
3. group by website
4. quickly create new tab, group and close tab
5. focus mode

Additional Features
1. quickly expand and close groups
2. merge all windows
3. group all ungrouped tabs
4. cmd + shift + click - move selected
5. clean User Interface
6. rename tabgroup
7. search and select tabs
8. focus mode / collapse all / open all

If you need some feature or facing bugs please let us know
https://github.com/sumitmatta998/mtm_

Quick Hacks *
To Display sidepanel on left side (go to chrome://settings/?search=side+panel) and select left side
To check chrome version - chrome://settings/help (>114 is requied)
